Open Payments

Financial Relationships

Andrew Bruce

2023-11-30

Source: vignettes/articles/open.Rmd
open.Rmd
library(provider)
library(future)
library(furrr)
library(dplyr)
open_payments(year = 2021, npi = 1043218118, na.rm = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 109 × 47

plan(multisession, workers = 4)
open  <- open_payments_(npi = 1043218118)
plan(sequential)
open

open |> 
  select(program_year, 
         payer_name, 
         pay_form,
         pay_nature,
         pay_total, 
         pay_date, 
         pay_count, 
         row_id, 
         group_id, 
         name, 
         covered,
         type, 
         category, 
         ndc,
         pdi)
